description: These UPF 50 sun-shielding, rain-and-stain repellent trail pants are built tough.  Flexible, articulated knees and tapered cuff at the ankle keep you moving with ease.  Featuring daisy chain loops for attaching gear and tools, along with multiple zippered pockets for your essentials.
name: Columbia Sportswear Black Mesa Woven Pants, 32" Inseam - Mens
